title: New & MPfree: Teen Daze – Waves (Demo)
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/5681601374_b044b517d0.jpg "Teen Daze - Waves")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7318-new-teen-daze-waves-demo/attachment/5681601374_b044b517d0)It’s a wonder that Teen Daze still has time to produce new music under that moniker, given his growing list of side projects; yet produce music he does, and we’re all the more grateful for it. New track, Waves, premiered via his [tumblr](http://teendaze.tumblr.com/post/5141381176/mp3-teen-daze-waves-its-been-a-while-since) earlier today and described as not being ‘anything finished or official’, is a taster of what’s to come from Teen Daze over the coming months. It’s a synth-laden affair; complete with languidly delivered vocals, not too much of a deviation from his previous work as Teen Daze, yet still an entirely enjoyable listen. Download Waves below and check out Teen Daze on [facebook.](http://www.facebook.com/teendaze)

[Teen Daze – Waves](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/10-Waves.mp3)
